title: yaml.Node merge semantics and custom-tag preservation enforcement
description: In the inheritance merge path, codify yaml.Node behavior for hooks/settings: semantic map merge, list replacement, explicit null clearing, omitted-key preservation, and acceptable loss of comments/anchor identity. Enforce fail-hard behavior when custom YAML tags cannot be preserved through merge round-trips while allowing standard YAML tags. Add focused tests in internal/config/role_test.go for custom-tag preserved success, custom-tag preservation failure (deterministic error), standard-tag behavior, anchor/alias normalization, and shape/type replacement edge cases.
